title: Luxury Overnight Cruise in Kerala
description: Board the most luxurious houseboats in Kerala, Spice Cruises Houseboats, and depart for an overnight cruise on the backwaters of Kerala. Choose between three stunning houseboats with three knowledgeable crew members including a driver, an assistant and a chef, and indulge in breakfast, lunch and dinner on board.
offer_address: Akkarakalam Memoirs Pooppally Jn. Chennamkary P.O Alleppey- 688501, Kerala, India

title: Five-Star Beachfront Kerala Escape
description: Brought to you by one of India’s most luxurious five-star hotel brands - The Lalit - you can spend three nights soaking up the tropical vibes of Kerala with a relaxing beachfront holiday at The Lalit Resort & Spa Bekal. Includes daily buffet breakfast, one three-course ‘Flavours of Kerala’ dining experience, one nightly beer or glass of wine each and one massage each.
offer_address: Padinhar Rd, Udma, Kerala 671319, India

title: Serene Thekkady Wilderness Escape near Periyar National Park with Daily Breakfast, High Tea & Activities
description: Immerse yourself in the verdant splendour of Mystic Mayapott Idukki, a sublime jungle retreat nestled within the aromatic cardamom plantations of Thekkady. This sanctuary of unparalleled luxury, only a short drive from Cochin International Airport (a 3.5-hour drive), captivates with its unique stone architecture, enveloped by a lush canopy of tropical rainforest. Surrender to the soothing symphony of the natural stream (seasonal), rejuvenate in the outdoor pool, and retire to your exquisitely designed bungalow. Savour authentic Keralan cuisine, embark on an invigorating plantation walk, or engage in thrilling activities like bird watching and fish hunting . Venture beyond your jungle haven to explore nearby Thekkady, Munnar, and the renowned Periyar Tiger Reserve. Your luxury jungle escape awaits.
offer_address: Pottamkulam Estate, Kadamakuzhi (PO) Idukki Near Kattappana Kerala 685515 India

title: Majestic Munnar Hilltop Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Delicately wrapped in mist, The Fog Munnar unfolds like a dream where the eco-friendly retreat lies tucked away on a hilltop amid rolling tea plantations. A charming hill station ideal for families and honeymooners, the gorgeous resort is located less than a three-hour drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), and a 10-hour drive from Bengaluru. Exquisitely designed to provide a holistic escape, the multiple award-winning paradise offers surreal mountain vistas and exudes an elegant aura with an outdoor pool, a spa and a multi-cuisine restaurant whipping up mouth-watering regional and global delicacies.

From the pleasant sights of perfectly manicured tea estates to the crisp mountain air of Munnar - the picturesque hill town is a blissful retreat for tea connoisseurs. Home to the world’s highest tea garden - Kolukkumalai Tea Estate at 8,000ft (a 30-minute drive), Munnar knows how to brew the perfect cup for everyone. With gurgling waterfalls like Attukad Falls (a 30-minute drive) and Cheeyappara Falls (a one-hour drive) dotting its slopes or the enthralling wildlife sanctuaries of Eravikulam National Park (a one-hour drive) and Chinnar Wildlife Sanctuary (a two-hour drive), Munnar is bound to cast a spell with its evergreen beauty.
offer_address: Chithirapuram, Eatty City Road Munnar, Kerala 685565, India

title: Serene Kerala Backwaters Stay with Daily Breakfast and Nightly Dinners
description: Sitting beside India's longest lake and dotted with lush greenery and immense natural beauty, the beautiful Purity at Lake Vembanad offers an idyllic escape from the everyday. Overlooking the glittering Lake Vembanad, this charming boutique hotel combines traditional Kerala architecture, a stunning collection of art and the quintessential calm that this slender coastal strip in beautiful Kerala is renowned for. Enjoy daily breakfast and nightly dinners for two adults as well as complimentary one-hour canoe hire and bike hire (subject to availability).
offer_address: East of Muhamma Police Station, Muhamma, Kerala 688525, India

title: Idyllic Five-Star Kerala Lakeside Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Surrounded by the serene backwaters of the lesser-known Vayalar region in Kerala, Vasundhara Sarovar Premiere is a secluded paradise, ideal for a relaxing escape. Just an 11-hour drive from Bengaluru and a 13-hour drive from Chennai, this lakeside haven will charm you with its heartwarming hospitality, specially curated wellness therapies and front-row views of the spectacular Vembanad Lake.

Taste your way through the three onsite restaurants, from all-day dining at Mystic Spice to poolside treats at Zephyr and specialty seafood at Chemeen & Madira. The resort's 30-minute complimentary evening cruise through the backwaters of Kerala is simply unmissable and perfectly rounds out a relaxing break in this beautiful part of India.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin every day in paradise with breakfast for two at Mystic Spice
- End every night with dinner for two at Mystic Spice, serving Keralan specialities and Western favourites

**Travelling with family?** One child (five and under) stays free in existing bedding with breakfast included. Or upgrade to the Deluxe Room and two children aged five and under stay free.

**Floating Jacuzzi Upgrade**: Stay in a floating cottage on the waters of a private lake when you upgrade to the Floating Cottage with Jacuzzi, complete with a private hot tub.
offer_address: VP II/123F, Vayalar, Cherthala, Kerala 688536, India

title: Beach Town Stay with Daily Breakfast and High Tea Each Night
description: The golden shores of Kovalam Beach in Kerala are calling: enjoy a few days of sunshine staying at Ayur Villa, located just 400m away from the beach. Your Escapes Club exclusive package includes three nights of accommodation with daily breakfast and a high tea experience every evening.
offer_address: Kovalam Vizhinjam P.O, 695521 Kovalam, India

title: Tropical Beachfront Escape in Kerala
description: Escape to India's beach paradise of Kerala for a relaxing tropical stay at B'Canti Boutique Beach Resort. Unwind at this beachfront resort located away from the crowds in a quiet part of Varkala and explore the local restaurants, surf shacks and shops. Stay three nights and enjoy delicious daily breakfasts, nightly three-course oceanfront dinners and nightly non-alcoholic beverages for two.
offer_address: Sree Eight, Edava Kunnumpuram Road, Varkala, Kerala 695311, India

title: Lakeside Lemon Tree Tranquility in Kerala
description: Explore the famous backwaters of Kerala with a relaxing escape at Lemon Tree Vembanad Lake Resort. Includes daily buffet breakfasts, one three-course dinner, one 30-minute massage each and one sunset boat cruise.
location_description: Lemon Tree Vembanad Lake Resort - OLD
offer_address: Janasakthi Road, Muhamma, Kayippuram, Alleppey, Kerala 688525, India

title: A Waterfront Oasis in Tropical Kerala
description: Experience the beautiful beaches and backwaters of tropical Kerala with a waterfront Escapes Club stay on the famous Lake Vembanad at Lemon Tree Vembanad Lake Resort. Take in stunning lakeside views and relax during your getaway, which includes a daily buffet breakfast, one buffet dinner for two during your stay and one 30-minute relaxation massage each during your stay.
offer_address: Janasakthi Road, Muhamma, Kayippuram, Alleppey, Kerala 688525, India

title: Boutique Kerala Oceanfront Retreat with Ayurvedic Treatment & Daily Dining
description:
Take your first step into the world of wellness at the charming Rockholm at the Light House Beach retreat, nestled in the scenic coastal town of Kovalam in Kerala. Located just 20km from Thiruvananthapuram, this beachside hotel offers traditional Ayurvedic treatments to nourish your mind, body and soul. With yoga sessions and specially curated farm-fresh cuisine, Rockholm at the Light House Beach offers a truly rejuvenating break.

Your wellness retreat includes daily breakfast and dinner (vegetarian meals only, surcharges will apply for meat dishes), one initial health consultation with an Ayurveda doctor for two per stay, a one-hour Ayurveda treatment per person per stay, one yoga session per stay, and one glass of herbal immunity-building tea per day. 

**Travelling with family?** Two children (aged five years and under) stay free on existing bedding with breakfast included.
location_description: Rockholm at the Light House Beach
offer_address: Light House Road, Kovalam, Trivandrum, Kerala 695527

title: Ultimate India Escape in Kerala: Two Resorts, One Package
description: Go from five-star beachfront luxury at Niraamaya Retreats Surya Samudra Kovalam to the recently opened Niraamaya Retreats Backwaters & Beyond Kumarakom - perched on the banks of Lake Vembanad. Take your special someone and enjoy a romantic getaway with a two-in-one package. Includes daily breakfast as well as a three-course dinner for two, two 60-minute massages to be shared by two and a nightly cocktail each at Surya Samudra Kovalam. You’ll also enjoy two, three-course meals and nightly mocktails at Backwaters & Beyond Kumarakom.
offer_address: Po, Pulinkudi Rd, Mullur, Kerala 695521, India

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Waterfront Kerala Escape with Decadent Dining
description: Perfectly positioned where the calm Neyyar river meets the Arabian Sea and swathed in lush mangroves, Estuary Sarovar Portico is more than your typical Kerala retreat. Spread over 16 acres of unique landscape, with unparalleled views of the sea, lake and backwaters, this Poovar Island resort is just an hour's drive from Kerala's capital, Thiruvananthapuram. Hidden within swaying coconut trees, this award-winning, five-star resort (a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 winner) features luxurious accommodation, a gourmet dining scene to satiate your tastebuds and an Ayurveda centre to help reconnect body and mind. The perfect retreat for a romantic escape or a family-friendly holiday, Estuary Sarovar Portico is your gateway to Kerala's vibrant beauty.
offer_address: Estuary Sarovar Portico Resort, Road, Kulathoor, Poovar, Kerala 695525

title: Five-Star Kumarakom Backwaters Escape with Daily Breakfast & Sunset Cruise
description:
Escape into a world of serenity and tranquility at the five-star Kumarakom Lake Resort, an utterly gorgeous resort perched on the banks of Kerala's Vembanad Lake.

One of the most popular resorts in God's Own Country, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this heritage property has been graced by the likes of Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall. A two-hour drive from Cochin Airport and easily accessible from major metro cities, this 25-acre lakefront paradise is dotted with uniquely designed rooms and villas that open up to a delightful meandering pool that eventually spills into the serene backwaters. Nature lovers and slow travellers will love unwinding in this top-rated resort that also boasts an authentic ayurvedic spa, lavish dining sites and soothing lake experiences.
offer_address: North Post, Vayitharamattom, Kumarakom, Kerala 686563

title: Idyllic Lakeside Kerala Escape with Daily Dining & Canoe Excursion
description:
Overlooking the fabled waters of the longest lake in India, Purity at Lake Vembanad is a tranquil escape from the everyday. This charming boutique hotel from the famed Relais & Châteaux Group combines traditional Keralan architecture, a stunning collection of art, and the quintessential sense of calm for which this slender coastal strip is renowned. Spend your days amid nature, cycling picturesque tracks, taking boat rides on Kerala's beautiful backwaters or marvelling at the colourful inhabitants of nearby Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary.

Located just two hours from Cochin Airport and 11 hours from Bangalore, this award-winning hotel offers uninterrupted views of India's longest lake and innovative wellness therapy, Purespa - a beautiful blend of traditional Ayurveda techniques and specialised Kalari Ayurvedic treatments - for ultimate relaxation.
offer_address: East of Muhamma Police Station, Muhamma, Kerala 688525

title: Kerala Beachfront Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast & Decadent Dining
description: Ideally located on one of the world's top 'Hammock Beaches', the stunning Marari Beach, and nestled within 18 acres of landscaped gardens, Xandari Pearl is the Kerala getaway you've been waiting for. Find luxurious serenity in one of just 27 villas, and enjoy private gardens, plunge pools and outdoor showers. Whether you are looking for a relaxing break, a beach vacation or a luxurious holiday, the eco-friendly paradise of Xandari Pearl is perfect for you.
offer_address: Beach Road, Arattukulam Jn, Mararikulam N, PO, S.L.Puram, Mararikulam, Kerala 688523

title: Kerala Beachfront Retreat with Ayurvedic Massage & Nightly Drinks
description:
Find relaxation at Neeleshwar Hermitage, situated amid 12 acres of stunning landscape dotted with lush palm groves, overlooking the shimmering Arabian Sea in Northern Kerala. This Ayurvedic retreat offers rejuvenation like no other. Get away from the hustle-bustle of the city and unwind by the beach, transform your body, mind and soul with traditional massages and relish tasty local delicacies.

Your escape includes daily breakfast, one three-course dinner, one daily glass of beer or wine per person and a 60-minute Ayurvedic massage per person.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Ozhinhavalappu, Kasaragod District, Near, Nileshwaram, Padnekkad, Kerala 671314

description: Escapes Club invites you to soak up the tropical vibes of Kerala with a relaxing beachfront holiday at The Lalit Resort & Spa Bekal - brought to you by one of India’s most luxurious five-star hotel brands, The Lalit. Includes daily buffet breakfast, one three-course ‘Flavours of Kerala’ dining experience and one nightly beer or glass of wine each.
offer_address: Padinhar Rd, Udma, Kerala 671319, India

title: Luxe Munnar Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Tea Plantation Tour
description: Embrace tranquillity and take in Munnar's scenery with a stay at the luxurious Vibe Munnar Resorts & Spa. Stay in stunning accommodations with amazing mountain views, relax in opulent jacuzzis, or select a private pool villa for some alone time with your loved ones. Boasting the largest rooftop pool in Munnar and the only helipad in town, this hotel is luxury redefined. Fill your days with lip-smacking Indian and international meals, fun experiences like tea plantation tours, nature walks, zip cycling, trekking and more.
offer_address: Eatty City Road Chithirapuram P.O Munnar,Idukki Kerala 685565 India

title: Boutique Kerala Stay with Nightly Oceanfront Dinners
description: Escape to the Indian beach paradise of Kerala for a relaxing tropical stay at B'Canti Boutique Beach Resort. Unwind away from the crowds in a quiet part of Varkala and explore the local restaurants, surf shacks and shops. Start each day with an included breakfast and enjoy a nightly three-course dinner at The Bait & Hook, the resort’s fine-dining beachfront restaurant serving traditional and continental cuisine. Embrace the holiday vibe with one 30-minute massage per person also included in your Escapes Club getaway.
offer_address: Sree Eight, Edava Kunnumpuram Road, Varkala, Kerala 695311, India

title: Grand Reopening: Kumarakom Backwaters Escape with Daily Breakfast, Sunset Cruise & One Dinner
description:
Indulge in a stay to remember on the shores of Lake Vembanad at the newly renovated Rhythm Kumarakom, a divine property in God's Own Country - Kerala. A two-hour drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), the hotel brings you one step closer to tranquillity. With an authentic architecture that complements the ethereal surroundings, the hotel offers a selection of beautiful cottages and villas to choose from for a relaxing holiday, and a swim in the impressive swimming pool (over 150 metres) and an Ayurvedic therapy session at the spa to align your chakras will relax you to the core. Panoramic views of the lake will soothe your eyes while the pleasing breeze will leave you feeling instantly relaxed.

Local delicacies prepared with perfection are sure to satisfy you to fuel you for days exploring the scenic backwaters of Kerala. You can enjoy sunset cruises on Lake Vembanad where lunch will be happily arranged by the hospitality team (extra charges apply) to add to the joyous moments. It's time for Kerala!
offer_address: Ammankari Road, Kumarakom West, Kottyam, Kerala 686563 India

title: Deluxe Oberoi Mumbai Stay with Romantic All-Inclusive Kerala Backwaters Cruise
description: Discover the height of Indian opulence with a luxurious South India holiday package, experiencing three nights at the five-star The Oberoi, Mumbai, followed by one night in a suite at the luxe Trident Hotel Cochin and a three-night, all-inclusive Kerala backwaters cruise on The Oberoi Motor Vessel Vrinda. Included in this once-in-a-lifetime trip are return flights between Mumbai and Cochin, Kerala, private airport transfers, daily buffet breakfast at both hotels, one nightly cocktail per person at The Oberoi, Mumbai, plus all meals onboard the boat, nightly evening entertainment and a sightseeing excursion with a guide.
offer_address: C - 46 / 452 (II, Bristow Rd, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala 682003, India

title: Kerala Beachfront Villa Escape with Daily Dining & Spa Discount
description:
Ideally located on one of the world's top 'Hammock Beaches', the stunning Marari Beach, and nestled within 18 acres of landscaped gardens, Xandari Pearl is the Kerala escape you've been waiting for. Find luxurious serenity in one of just 27 villas, and enjoy your private garden, your own slice of the lush surroundings. Whether you are looking for a relaxing break, a beach vacation or a luxurious holiday, the eco-friendly paradise of Xandari Pearl is perfect for you.

With crystal-clear waters and white sands, Marari Beach is one of the best beaches in Kerala. Located in the quaint fishing village of Maraikulam, this beach is perfect for those seeking some peace and tranquillity. Forget all your stress and unwind in this heavenly spot: laze by the pool, enjoy a treatment at the onsite spa, or savour local flavours at the Pearl Spot restaurant, supplied by the resort's own farm, with a focus on fresh, organic eating and locally sourced produce.
offer_address: Beach Road, Arattukulam Junction, Mararikulam North PO, S.L.Puram, Mararikulam, Alappuzha, Kerala 688523

title: Ayana Fort Kochi: Daily breakfast and two three-course dinners
description: Embrace the elegance of yesteryear with two nights at Ayana Fort Kochi. The hotel is housed in a renovated 200-year old courthouse on Bazaar Road - the oldest international trading market in India. Enjoy daily breakfast and two delicious three-course dinners for two adults.
offer_address: Calvathy Road, Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala 682002, India

title: Secluded Kerala Beachfront Escape near Alleppey with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Dining Discount
description:
Lulled by the melody of sea waves, Amritara A Beach Symphony is a tranquil coastal paradise perched on the sandy shores of Mararikulam near Alleppey in Kerala. Merely a two-hour drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), the hotel offers a serene seaside hideaway with roomy traditional cottages garlanded by lush gardens and coconut palms. Spend your time sea-gazing or take a dip in the gorgeous pool, feast on local Kerala delicacies as you stretch out on the lawn and bask in the serenity of your coastal escape. Merely steps away from the beautiful Marari Beach, the resort allows you to spend your time swimming in the sea, lazing on the beach, or going for a sunset stroll along the shoreline.

Explore the quaint sea town of Mararikulam by interacting with the locals or venture a little further and visit the enchanting backwaters at Alleppey (a 30-minute drive). For those keen on discovering the aesthetic colonial charms of God’s Own Country, Fort Kochi (an hour’s drive), famed for its colonial architecture and Chinese Fishing Nets, should be on the bucket list.
offer_address: West of Mararikkulam Beach Junction Mararikulam, Kerala 688549 India

title: Tranquil Backwaters Escape with Daily Dining Experiences
description: Leave your troubles behind and embark on a serene holiday in the beautiful backwaters of Alleppey. Stay at Vasundhara Sarovar Premiere, a stunning resort boasting an amazing location with views of the backwaters from its lavish infinity pool. Reconnect with nature in this gorgeous hotel and enjoy daily dinner at Mystic Spice restaurant, daily buffet breakfast, a nightly cocktail and more.
offer_address: VP II/123F, Vayalar, Cherthala, Kerala 688536, India

title: All-Inclusive Oberoi Luxury Cruise along Kerala’s Backwaters
description: Board the incredible The Oberoi Motor Vessel Vrinda for an ultra-luxurious two or three day cruise of the glistening backwaters of Kerala. Admire the beautiful scenery of paddy fields and coconut palms as you get pampered with 24-hour private butler service, daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, evening entertainment, all land excursions with an expert guide, and return transfers between Cochin airport and Vembanad lake jetty.
offer_address: C - 46 / 452 (II, Bristow Rd, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala 682003, India

title: Boutique Beachfront Stay with Exclusive Dining Inclusions
description: Leave it all behind and embrace the serenity of Neeleshwar Hermitage, a secluded tropical haven set in a lush palm grove on a pristine beach in Northern Kerala. This idyllic resort invites you to unwind by the beach, take yoga classes as the sun rises on the Arabian Sea and relax amid the serene landscape. Your escape includes daily breakfast, one three-course dinner, one beer or wine per person and a 30-minute massage per person.
offer_address: Ozhinhavalappu, Kasaragod District, Near, Nileshwaram, Padnekkad, Kerala 671314, India

vendor_name: The Leela Kovalam, A Raviz Hotel
title: Top-Rated Kerala Clifftop Hideaway with Private Beach & Ocean-View Infinity Pool
description: Perfectly positioned overlooking the Arabian Sea and surrounded by lush coconut groves, The Leela Kovalam, A Raviz Hotel is an idyllic five-star Kerala retreat. Spread over 67 acres of unique landscape, with unparalleled views of the ocean, this clifftop resort offers the best of both worlds, perched less than a 30-minute drive from Kerala's capital, Thiruvananthapuram. Embrace the beauty of the swaying palms, awe-inspiring sunsets and opulent facilities at this award-winning escape, where you'll find luxurious accommodation, five restaurants and bars and a tranquil day spa inspired by ancient Ayurvedic traditions. Dive into the depths of the Arabian Sea and let the colourful marine life enchant you or kick-back poolside to make the most of this romantic or family-friendly holiday.
location_description: The Leela Kovalam, a Raviz Hotel
offer_address: Beach Road, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695527, India

vendor_name: The Leela Ashtamudi - A Raviz Hotel
title: Five-Star Kerala Boutique Lakeside Resort with Ayurvedic Spa
description: Overlooking soothing Lake Ashtamudi and surrounded by nature, The Raviz Ashtamudi is a tranquil oasis perfect for a restful retreat. Enjoy vivid natural vistas while savouring culinary delights in the four atmospheric restaurants and bars. Reconnect with nature and enjoy panoramic views, rejuvenate your mind and body at the Kerala Ayurveda & Spa, refresh with a dip in the pool or retire to a spacious guestroom for a restful slumber.
location_description: The Leela Ashtamudi - A Raviz Hotel
offer_address: Elamballoor Rd, Palace Nagar, Thevally, Kollam, Kerala, 691601, India
